I have started ignoring Metallica's notifications because they are now premiers I cannot watch. It is annoying, overtly commercial, inconvenient, time wasting, bandwidth wasting, and sabotages legitimate notifications.

Let's hope Metallica will surprise us by playing Mama Said, Free Speech for the Dumb, The More I See, Ronnie Rising Medley, Beyond Magnetic "complete", Astronomy, Ramones all covers and Motorhead all covers, sometime

So I click on this but I can't watch it because it's not going to be live for another 91 minutes? I turned off my notifications for a reason, and this basically amounts to an advertisement cluttering up my subscription page. Especially when there are lots of other "premieres" in there too, which I also can't watch. Best case,  I can pick them up in the middle, which is not how I want to be watching these things. So I think this feature is garbage, and I encourage this channel to not do premieres. I am casually subscribed because I'm a big fan and I like to watch these videos occasionally. But I'm not religious about it and this is the kind of thing that pushes me away.
